TextLibrary.Text: Patch
Ugh! Who lives in this smelly hole?
Ugh! Who lives in this smelly hole?
Ugh! Who lives in this smelly hole?
Ugh! Who lives in this smelly hole?
Quick! Come inside! There are eyes everywhere... watching...
Quick! Come inside! There are eyes everywhere... watching...
Quick! Come inside! There are eyes everywhere... watching...
Quick! Come inside! There are eyes everywhere... watching...
Are you okay? Can I help you?
Are you okay? Can I help you?
Are you okay? Can I help you?
Are you okay? Can I help you?
Yes! No! Maybe... I don't KNOW...
Yes! No! Maybe... I don't KNOW...
Yes! No! Maybe... I don't KNOW...
Yes! No! Maybe... I don't KNOW...
Look, why don't you tell me your problem? I'll help if I can.
Look, why don't you tell me your problem? I'll help if I can.
Look, why don't you tell me your problem? I'll help if I can.
Look, why don't you tell me your problem? I'll help if I can.
There are men looking for me! Men! Nearby at the Pike! Men in dark cloaks... danger everywhere...
There are men looking for me! Men! Nearby at the Pike! Men in dark cloaks... danger everywhere...
There are men looking for me! Men! Nearby at the Pike! Men in dark cloaks... danger everywhere...
There are men looking for me! Men! Nearby at the Pike! Men in dark cloaks... danger everywhere...
Okay... I'll travel to the Pike and get rid of them and then you can explain to me what this is all about.
Okay... I'll travel to the Pike and get rid of them and then you can explain to me what this is all about.
Okay... I'll travel to the Pike and get rid of them and then you can explain to me what this is all about.
Okay... I'll travel to the Pike and get rid of them and then you can explain to me what this is all about.
You would do that for me? For ME? I will pay you like a prince! Like a KING!
You would do that for me? For ME? I will pay you like a prince! Like a KING!
You would do that for me? For ME? I will pay you like a prince! Like a KING!
You would do that for me? For ME? I will pay you like a prince! Like a KING!
Okay. Just calm down. I'll be back shortly.
Okay. Just calm down. I'll be back shortly.
Okay. Just calm down. I'll be back shortly.
Okay. Just calm down. I'll be back shortly.
